summary: A suite of GPU‑focused unit tests that verify the numerical accuracy and edge‑case handling of CuPy's SciPy special function implementations, comparing their outputs against NumPy/SciPy reference results for a wide range of inputs (scalars, arrays, infinities, NaNs, etc.).
business_intent: Validate and maintain compatibility of the CuPy SciPy special module with standard CPU implementations, ensuring reliable GPU‑accelerated computations for scientific and engineering applications.
